 </td>
<td  border="3px">
<b>Layer:</b> Core — <b>Required: </b>  ‘Yes’ for media collections, ‘No’ for media resources (but preferred if available) — <b>Repeatable: </b> Yes</td>

<tr>
<td  border="3px">Definition:</td>
<td  border="3px">An arbitrary code that is unique for the resource, with the resource being either a provider, collection, or media item.</td>
